snippet: This would give the city’s dysfunctional Board of Elections plenty of time to prepare for a September runoff.
abstract: Editorial calls on New York State lawmakers to move date of primary elections to June, which would give city's dysfunctional Board of Elections enough time to prepare for possibility of September runoff in mayoral election.
lead_paragraph: This would give the city’s dysfunctional Board of Elections plenty of time to prepare for a September runoff.

headline.seo: Voting Should Be Easy: Move Up N.Y.C.’s Primaries
headline.main: Move New York City’s Primaries to June
headline.print_headline: Move New York City’s primaries to June
